import React from 'react' import Profile from "../../img/profileImg.jpg" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { followUser } from '../../Action/userAction' const User = ({person,id}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const handleFollow = ()=>{ dispatch(followUser(person._id,user)) } return (
{person?.firstname} {person.lastname} @{person.username}
) } export default User
